char_info.desc: The Maiden Who Converts Determination to Strength

a0.speaker: Emiri:
a0.dialogue: Good grief... I was almost sliced into half by that sword, but thankfully, the Archangel saved me in the nick of time...

a1.speaker: Youmu:
a1.dialogue: Oh, so you were able to dodge my slashes as easily as pie?

a2.speaker: Youmu:
a2.dialogue: You are lucky this time. But if you mess with me again, I will make you go west!
